title: Student Athletes Score Unanimous Win Over NCAA
itunes:title: Student Athletes Score Unanimous Win Over NCAA
description:
Audrey Anderson, who heads the higher education practice at Bass Berry & Sims, discusses the implications of the Supreme Court's decision clearing the way for greater compensation for student-athletes.

Jonathan Macey, a professor at Yale Law School, discusses the Supreme Court dealing a blow to Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac investors in their challenge to the government’s collection of more than $100 billion in profits from the mortgage giants.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
